search.query: sourcetype=capture | dedup source | rex field=source "\S*\/(?<shortSource>[^\)].*)" | table shortSource

$source_token$ | dedup dst_fqdn | table dst_fqdn, dst_latitude, dst_longitude | rename dst_fqdn as destination, dst_latitude as latitude, dst_longitude as longitude | lookup geo_countries longitude, latitude | stats count by featureId | rename count as Destinations, featureId as Country | geom geo_countries featureIdField="Country"

$source_token$ | table dst_fqdn, dst_latitude, dst_longitude, traffic_analyzer_tcp_stream | dedup traffic_analyzer_tcp_stream | rename dst_fqdn as Destination, dst_latitude as latitude, dst_longitude as longitude | lookup geo_countries longitude, latitude | $selectedCountryFilter$ | stats count(traffic_analyzer_tcp_stream) by Destination | table Destination, count(traffic_analyzer_tcp_stream) | rename count(traffic_analyzer_tcp_stream) as "# of connections" | sort - "# of connections"
